thread.title: Apple faces these technical roadblocks in the comedown from earnings euphoria

author: Keris Lahiff
title: Apple faces these technical roadblocks in the comedown from earnings euphoria
text: Apple faces these technical roadblocks in the comedown from earnings euphoria Keris Lahiff Reblog As Apple AAPL basks in its post-earnings glow, one technician warns of a bumpier road that could put the path to a $1 trillion market cap at risk. "We're gapping up into this huge, massive overhead supply," Todd Gordon , founder of TradingAnalysis.com, told CNBC's " Trading Nation " on Wednesday. "Apple is trying to get through this $175 to $180 level all the way back from November of last year.
